name: Sinner's Hotel
description:
Michael decided to kill himself. Now he is literally stuck in a loop. And he is in Hell. Do you think this is the end? Huh, this is just the beginning!

Controls:
AD - walk
Space - jump
LBM - choose an option

The game was create for Ludum Dare 47
